channel.title: Daily Ranking
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Daily Ranking"

item.title: Re: Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
Silver Elixers are your friend. As are parties.

You should be able to down at least 6 silver Elixers (probably more); that'll take you more than half way to Sannin. Two more parties will net you at least 100k more. Even without Catgirl Entourage or Late Night Snack, you've only got 300k more to Sannin, which isn't hard. I made ~400k today just running A-rank missions with a Note Rush and Arena Favorite. (Of course, crank 9 helps tooâ€¦)

item.title: Re: Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
currently the only things that help ranking exp are

mr. tea
strawberry 3
annie 2
note rush
and arena favorite

item.title: Daily Ranking
item.content:encoded:
What is the best way to go to get daily ranking now since XP no longer effects ranking exp?

(example) Timmy Lvl 2: +20% exp
also Obsessive Insight: +1 Levels, -25% Ryo, +50% AP/XP on Missions

these don't effect ranking exp anymore

Specifically I'm looking for the best S1 team but more suggestions are wellcome
